wikipedia_page.main: John Turner (born 12 February 1986) is an English footballer who played in the Football League as a forward for Cambridge United and Rushden & Diamonds. He currently plays for Corby Town.

response: John Turner (1929–2020) was the 17th Prime Minister of Canada.
